subject: Swimming
lead_paragraph: Phelps will return to competition next week at the Arena Pro Swim Series in Mesa, Ariz., after serving a six-month suspension following a drunken-driving conviction, U.S.A. Swimming said.
snippet: Phelps will return to competition next week at the Arena Pro Swim Series in Mesa, Ariz., after serving a six-month suspension following a drunken-driving conviction, U.S.A. Swimming said.
